title: Green Hay Bale Maker - Free Stock Creative Commons Video

subtasks: Sitting on the combine's seat
Moving arms to control the harvester's direction
Manipulating levers to adjust harvesting settings
Monitoring grain levels in the combine's bin
Sitting on the tractor's seat
Controlling steering wheel to navigate fields
Adjusting speed while driving
Climbing onto the combine's header
Fastening or loosening header components
Removing or replacing header parts as needed
Uncovering the truck bed if necessary
Using a pitchfork to transfer grain from combine to truck
Ensuring grain is loaded safely without spilling
Disassembling parts for cleaning
Wiping down surfaces to remove residue
Lubricating moving parts as needed
